Community Building

Virtual Coffee

Creator and Maintainer

I (accidentally) created the tech community Virtual Coffee in April of 2020, and initiated the vision that supports 700+ developers at all levels with weekly events, slack, monthly challenges, a newsletter, podcast, and larger initiatives.

Podcasts

The Virtual Coffee Podcast

Co-host and co-producer, featuring members of the VC Community telling their stories and what they've learned.
